title: Being right: can you still lose?
creator_contributor_role: Walt Disney Educational Media Company, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Competition (Psychology)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Excerpts
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Conduct of life
description: Episode of Series "Questions, Answers.". An excerpt from the feature " Ride a wild pony", which has an Australian setting. Conflict flares when two children claim ownership of a wild pony. A judge settles the dispute by allowing the pony to decide. The film centres on how the children cope with the decision. The aim of the film is to allow children to explore the concepts of winning and losing and how to deal with them. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.
